plugin.name: AvSound
plugin.author: Andrew Johnson
plugin.purpose: Sounds and substitutions for Avalon; The Legend Lives
plugin.description:
This plugin provides substitutions and sounds for Avalon; the Legend Lives. It assumes you have the MushReader plugin, which can be found at http://www.allinaccess.com/mc - and that you have the sounds included in the zip file this plugin normally ships in.
This is a work in progress and by no means complete or comrehensive. It should also be born in mind that this plugin revolves primarily around my own combat needs, though I am constantly tinkering to create the best experience possible. Feature requests, edits and the like can be contributed on the Meetplace forums, or directly to me at agarwain@meetplace.net .

trigger.match: Lightning whacks into a pretty balloon you hold. The vapours within burst forth, tearing through the thin fabric, as if having captured the bolt.
^(left|right) side ready.$
trigger.name: balance

trigger.match: ^You have regained your ([A-z]+)-sided balance.$
trigger.name: long_balance_sub

trigger.match: ^Your elemental equilibrium will return in (roughly|around) (.*).$
trigger.name: eleq_time

trigger.match: Elemental equilibrium is regained.
trigger.name: eleq_balance

trigger.match: You are unbalanced and cannot concentrate enough.
trigger.name: off_bal

trigger.match: You are unbalanced and cannot move.
trigger.name: off_balance_moving

trigger.match: You could take a healing herb again.
trigger.name: on_balance_herb

trigger.match: You could take another health or mana restorative.
trigger.name: on_potion_balance

trigger.match: You have equilibrium.
trigger.name: soft_equilibrium

trigger.match: You have no equilibrium.
trigger.name: no_equilibrium

trigger.match: You have not yet the equilibrium to perform the act.
trigger.name: off_equilibrium

trigger.match: You would be able to take an allheale again.
trigger.name: allheale_bal

trigger.match: * directs a dazzling beam of light at you, and you are held immediately by the hypnotic rays and must struggle free.
trigger.name: dazzled

trigger.match: ^You strip (.*) of cold resistance.$
trigger.name: scathed_cold

trigger.match: As the blow slips harmlessly through the form of Agarwain, the phantasm disperses with a wink.
trigger.name: phantasm_sub

trigger.match: eyes lose their white glaze at the touch of your candescence.$
trigger.name: dazzle_blind

trigger.match: is distracted but only for a fleeting moment by your dazzling.$
trigger.name: dazzle_ignore

trigger.match: You direct a dazzling beam of light at * who is held immediately by the hypnotic rays.
trigger.name: dazzle_hit

trigger.match: You direct a dazzling beam of light at * whose disinterest is most surprising as the hypnotic rays fail you.
trigger.name: dazzle_insouciance

trigger.match: You part your palms in the direction of *, applying your candescent powers to draw away luminosity.
trigger.name: weave_void_sound

trigger.match: Your ignorance is broken by * dazzling candescent lights.
trigger.name: ignorance_down_azzle

trigger.match: Your sight is restored by * dazzling candescent lights.
trigger.name: dazzle_restored_sight

trigger.match: * has been slain by *.
^(.*) (says|asks|exclaims), (.*).$
^([A-z]+) calls? to the ([A-z]+) Guild\: (.*)$
^([A-z]+) calls? to the Entwined Orders\: (.*)$
trigger.name: entwined_order_calling

trigger.match: ^([A-z]+) calls? to the Order of .*\: (.*)$
^([A-Za-z]+) calls? (his|her|to your|to his|to her) ([A-Za-z]+)\: (.*)$
^\[(Patron|Field Marshall|Deputy Marshall|General|Colonel|Major|Captain|Lieutenant|Cadet)\] ([A-z]+)\: (.+)$
^To the [A-z]+ military\: (.+)$
^You speak to your \"[A-z]+\" team. You call to [A-z]+ fellow team-members\: (.*)$
trigger.name: me_to_team

trigger.match: * stands within a pentacle.
trigger.name: pented_sub

trigger.match: ^(.+) strokes (his|her) charmed fingers against your weary head mumbling words of enchanted and wonderfully restful import.
trigger.name: mindbleed

trigger.match: You cast an icy aura about *
trigger.name: iced

trigger.match: ^(.*) breaks free from the ice encasing (him|her).$
trigger.name: ice_free

trigger.match: ^Your buckled, feeble (left|right) leg is strengthened suddenly.$
trigger.name: cured_broken_leg

trigger.match: Optimism banishes the depression from your heart.
trigger.name: cured_pessimism

trigger.match: The curse of disloyalty is gone.
The megillos herb banishes despair from your mind.
trigger.name: cured_nann

trigger.match: The ollso heals your contracted windpipe.
trigger.name: cured_windpipe

trigger.match: You take a heavy breath as your windpipe recovers.
trigger.name: windpipe_cured_time

trigger.match: You wake yourself up from a deep slumber.
trigger.name: awakened

trigger.match: A divine alkar springs up about your form.
trigger.name: alkar

trigger.match: A whirling globe of essence forms itself from the vapours of the herb of malloran.
trigger.name: malloran_sub

trigger.match: The aura surrounding you flickers brightly and then fades into nothing.
trigger.name: lost_malloran

trigger.match: The divine alkar which protected you disperses with a puff of smoke.
trigger.name: alkar_down

trigger.match: The sounds about you become muffled and cease; you have gone deaf.
trigger.name: gone_deaf

trigger.match: The world about you falls into darkness; you have gone blind.
trigger.name: blind_def

trigger.match: You cease to parry.
trigger.name: off_parry

trigger.match: You cross your arms in front of you to parry incoming blows.
trigger.name: fullparrying

trigger.match: A great billow of underworldly effluent surrounds * suddenly, consuming the demon instantly with a crackle of hellflames.
trigger.name: warding_banished_demon

trigger.match: The demonic pestilence gives you *
trigger.name: pestilence

trigger.match: The silver arrow strikes directly into the insipid heart of * and the undead creature is consumed in white fire with a horrific scream.
trigger.name: quarreled

trigger.match: You are tripped up by the demonic imp and stunned momentarily.
trigger.name: imp

trigger.match: You are unbalanced on your steed by the demonic imp.
trigger.name: imp_on_steed

trigger.match: You are afflicted by *
trigger.name: diag_shorthand

trigger.match: A great explosion of earth power sends a dusty shaft of soil-and-rock slamming into you, shattering violently on impact!
trigger.name: earthbolt_hit

trigger.match: You move at the centre of the flaming vortex.
trigger.name: fire_vortex

trigger.match: You are scattered by the acidic blood of *
trigger.name: ichored

trigger.match: \sYou notice a single exit, (.*)\.$
trigger.name: format_single_exit

trigger.match: You notice a single exit, (.*)\.$
trigger.name: format_single_exit_no_space

trigger.match: You notice exits (.*)\.$
trigger.name: format_exits_new

trigger.match: * is here, shrouded in a cloak of invisibility.
trigger.name: invisible_sub

trigger.match: Slinking about nearby, you spot the figure of *.
trigger.name: blended_sub

trigger.match: The sweet smelling mist caresses your nostrils, relaxing your insomniac state.
trigger.name: soma

trigger.match: A feeling of fearlessness descends upon you.
trigger.name: quixotism

trigger.match: You are struck by a sudden fear of heights.
trigger.name: fatalism_vertigo

trigger.match: You feel a sense of potency and inner strength.
trigger.name: parasite

trigger.match: You feel lighter, suddenly - somehow less full-bodied.
trigger.name: shimmering

trigger.match: You grow tired, suddenly, of all this new-fangled learning.
trigger.name: stupidity

trigger.match: You look down at your hands - they are starting to become translucent!
trigger.name: shimmer

trigger.match: Your mind darkens. What is the point of living, you ask yourself?
trigger.name: pessimism

trigger.match: Your movements become dull and sluggish.
trigger.name: sloth

trigger.match: Your mystic barrier has been shattered by the fatalist touch of *
trigger.name: barrier_down

trigger.match: Your stomach burns like fire; food and drink are an impossibility.
trigger.name: anorexia

trigger.match: barges over to you and pushes you sturdily to the (\w+).$
trigger.name: pushed

trigger.match: gives you a short, sharp blow to your windpipe - you choke and splutter to try to regain your breath.$
trigger.name: windpipe

trigger.match: You are now blocking movement to the (.*).
trigger.name: block_dir

trigger.match: You inhale a deep lungful of air.
trigger.name: inhale

trigger.match: *, as your proxy*
trigger.name: gag_proxy

trigger.match: *doughty watchman*
*reads from a great spellbook and a lumen of octarine glows overhead.
trigger.name: other_read_spellbook_gag

trigger.match: ^(.*) continues to work on (his|her) lorerobes of many-colours, weaving a (.*) into its rich, thick fabric.$
^A light sprite dances a brilliant but ever-moving luminosity about the locale.(.*)
trigger.name: werelight_sub

trigger.match: A *-shaped rune emblazons against you.
trigger.name: rune_strike_gag

trigger.match: A gentle breeze gives your pipe a sudden red glow.
A glowing rune staff is the last thing to catch your attention.
trigger.name: runestave_leaving_gag

trigger.match: A glowing runic stave here is the first thing to catch your attention.
trigger.name: runestave_enter_gag

trigger.match: A magestaff sheds some light on the surroundings.*
trigger.name: magestaff_gag

trigger.match: Columns of smoke rise from your pipe.
Dark vaporous emanations spread regions of freezing cold about the locale.
flexes (his|her) muscles and inhales deeply.$
trigger.name: flex_gag

trigger.match: Movement is returned by dint of ritual power.
trigger.name: ritual_movement_gag

trigger.match: On you ride.
trigger.name: riding_gag

trigger.match: On you ride. *
trigger.name: omit_riding_message

trigger.match: Power fills your voice again.
The brief flash of countless tiny proto-elemental motes of iridescence spark and scintillate about the locale.
The embers of your pipe give off a pleasing aroma.
The mists of peace lift themselves from this location.
trigger.name: gag_peace

trigger.match: The soft emerald-green light of the globestave emanation sparkles from myriad points about the location, each node its own source of enrichment and fertility.
trigger.name: gag_fertility

trigger.match: The statuesque sentinel blinks.
The taste of your pipe is most pleasant.
You are able to breathe despite the watery surroundings.
You are flying above the surface of the water.
trigger.name: flying_over_water

trigger.match: You are fording water with your steed.
trigger.name: ford_gag

trigger.match: You are unable to avoid seeing a cloud-shaped rune. You feel your eyelids gain in weight.
trigger.name: cloud_gag

trigger.match: You close your eyes briefly to recover equilibrium.
trigger.name: equilibrium_gag

trigger.match: You feel most distinguished, your pipe at your lips.
You reach into a whirling earth elemental infused by elemental roots to derive your power.
trigger.name: earthbolt_roots_gag

trigger.match: You read from a great spellbook and a lumen of octarine glows overhead.
trigger.name: read_spellbook_gag

trigger.match: You ride a great winged dragon *
trigger.name: riding_dragon_gag

trigger.match: You see a *-shaped rune out of the corner of your eye.
trigger.name: seen_rune_gag

trigger.match: Your echo ritual conjures the playing of *
Your might is not great enough to challenge *
trigger.name: pentacle_gag

trigger.match: *The sky is dark, night covers Avalon. *
trigger.name: nighttime_gag

trigger.match: Light shines from a magestaff you hold.*
trigger.name: magestaff_light_gag

trigger.match: Pools of light shine out, here and there, like luminous shadows. *
trigger.name: shadows_gag

trigger.match: You are able to see through your mind's eye. *
(Dwarves|Monks) left\]$

trigger.name: herblist_herb_replacement
trigger.send: Note( "%3 %1, %4") if inpouch == 1 then Send( "inp %3 %1" ) end

trigger.match: You hold, in your hands, *
trigger.name: herblist_end
trigger.send:
if check_herblist then DeleteTimer( check_herblist ) end
-- transfer our new herblist over the old one -- for k, v in pairs( temp_herblist ) do todo.outp[k].have = v end
-- disable herblist triggers -- EnableGroup( "herblist", 0)

trigger.match: ^(Soft|Hard)-Equilibrium (.*)$
^You have regained your (left|right)-sided balance (.*)$
*blocks you from moving *
trigger.name: blocked_interrupt

trigger.match: Fife-music vibrations enshroud you in an aura of deadening, your movement slowing rapidly to mere walking pace*
trigger.name: fifewalk

trigger.match: The soil-and-stone careers into your pentacle, obfuscating it entirely but entirely deprived of power by your defensive magic.
trigger.name: pent_down_earthbolt

trigger.match: You are blown by a mighty gust of wind to the *.
trigger.name: trombone_interrupt

trigger.match: You are inexorably drawn towards a nearby but unseen force of irresistible gravity.
trigger.name: gravity_interrupt

trigger.match: You are summoned by *
trigger.name: summon_interrupt

trigger.match: You must slay the slime demon before you can attack anything else.
trigger.name: slime_interrupt

trigger.match: Your movements become sluggish*
trigger.name: sloth_interrupt

trigger.match: You let * fall to the ground.
trigger.name: dropped_item

trigger.match: You pick up *
trigger.name: get_item

trigger.match: ^An image of (.*) appears\; the location \"(.*)\" forming a fleeting backdrop to the vision.$
trigger.name: location_sub

trigger.match: You examine the clues, sniff the air and question your intuition; you see an echo of *
trigger.name: truediscern_sub

trigger.match: ^(.+) beckons a globe made of whirling malloran vapour. It forms a golden aura in (his|her) entourage.$
trigger.send: if string.find("%1", target) then Sound(GetInfo(67).."/sounds/malloran_up.wav") end Note( "Mal up %1")

trigger.match: ^The golden aura encircling (.+) flickers bright then fades into nothing.$
trigger.send: if string.find("%1", target) then Sound(GetInfo(67).."/sounds/malloran_down.wav") end Note( "Mal down %1" )

trigger.match: ^(.*) looks bemused as the \"([A-z]+)\" defence bleeds unexpectedly out of (his|her) mind.$
trigger.name: mindbleed_first

trigger.match: *shuffles about in the mist.
trigger.name: shuffling_about

trigger.match: The mists swirl about you ambiguously.
trigger.name: mist_swirl_sub

trigger.match: You lurch forward in the constricted air.
trigger.name: lurch_sub

trigger.match: ^Echoes of taborstick-music fill the air, resonating to a wonderfully clear code - the moment of enchantment - then receding in a soft but rapid fashion.$
trigger.name: echo_sub

trigger.match: Echoes of fife-music fill the air, resonating to a wonderfully clear code - the moment of enchantment - then receding in a soft but rapid fashion.
trigger.name: fife_echo

trigger.match: ^([A-z]+) cannot hear your music.$
trigger.name: deaf

trigger.match: ^The deadening fife-music envelops ([A-z]+), slowing (him|her) to normal movement pace. (His|Her) stealthy speed manages to dodge any further sluggishness effects.$
trigger.name: sloth_slowed

trigger.match: ^The heavy vibrations of the fife envelop ([A-z]+), deadening (his|her) senses. (His|Her) breathing becomes laboured and shallow and (his|her) movements lurch with heavy sluggishness.$
trigger.name: fifed

trigger.match: The banging of the tabor shatters the deafness which afflicted *
trigger.name: taborstick_sub

trigger.match: The highpoint of the echoing fife-music envelops * in a deadening aura. *
trigger.name: echo_fifed

trigger.match: * bonds a strange wax figurine against you.
trigger.name: bonded

trigger.match: ^There are (.*) batches of ([A-z]+) here.$
trigger.send: bc_herbcount = convert_words_to_numbers("%1") herbcount = bc.tonumber(bc_herbcount) herb = "%2" Note (herbcount .. " " .. (herb))

trigger.match: ^\s+pipe(\d+)\s+A wooden pipe\s+No herb\.$
trigger.name: pipelist_empty

trigger.match: ^\s+pipe(\d+)\s+A wooden pipe\s+(\w+) \((\d+) maximum puffs\)$
trigger.name: pipelist_body

trigger.match: You take a puff of the pipe, but find it is empty of leaf.
trigger.name: pipe_empty1

trigger.match: The pipe is not lit.
trigger.name: unlit_pipe

trigger.match: The pipe is empty; what did you expect to light?
trigger.name: empty_pipe

trigger.match: Due to lack of expertise, your pipe has gone out.
trigger.name: pipe_out

trigger.match: ^Your (left|right) leg buckles beneath you - it has been weakened and can no longer take your weight.$
trigger.name: quirrog

trigger.match: ^Your (left|right) wrist swells up suddenly, and then deflates rapidly. The painful experience disables your (left|right) arm.$
trigger.name: resik

trigger.match: A diabolical curse to the Gods rings in your ears.
trigger.name: blackroot

trigger.match: A distant, but malevolent singing rings in your ears.
trigger.name: exaar

trigger.match: A luminous stickiness strikes you, covering your skin horribly.
trigger.name: kural

trigger.match: The skies turn grey and unwelcoming.
trigger.name: blackroot2

trigger.match: The tender-hearted hands of sleep brush against your weary eyelids.
trigger.name: mandrake

trigger.match: The thought of food and drink revolts you suddenly.
trigger.name: grimleaf

trigger.match: The world about you seems to darken somewhat.
trigger.name: jegga

trigger.match: There is a stabbing pain in your chest and you fall to the floor gasping in pain.
trigger.name: kly

trigger.match: Why, you suddenly ask, does the world act so unfairly towards you!
trigger.name: nann

trigger.match: You feel malcoordinated all of a sudden; all fingers and thumbs.
trigger.name: gilf

trigger.match: You hear a distant popping sound.
trigger.name: athanzar

trigger.match: Your hyper-adrenalin settles down to normal.
trigger.name: mandrake_takes_adrenalin

trigger.match: Your stomach is struck by violent cramps.
Your tongue begins to itch slightly. You rub it against your teeth only to discover, to your horror, that it has painlessly rotted away.
trigger.name: yake

trigger.match: Your vocal chords are swollen and cannot utter a sound.
trigger.name: ikirax
format_prompt
trigger.send:
-- set current stats based on prompt -- status.last_health = status.current_health status.current_health = tonumber( %1 ) status.delta_health = status.current_health - status.last_health status.last_mana = status.current_mana status.current_mana = tonumber( %2 ) status.delta_mana = status.current_mana - status.last_mana status.prompt_status = "%3" status.health_percent = 100 * ( status.current_health / status.max_health ) status.health_percent = status.health_percent - status.health_percent % 1 status.mana_percent = 100 * ( status.current_mana / status.max_mana ) status.mana_percent = status.mana_percent - status.mana_percent % 1
-- delete ugly prompt -- InfoClear()
-- indicate pause -- if sys_pause == 1 then Note "(P)" end
-- Display the new, slick prompt -- Info ("%1h %2m %3")

trigger.match: ^Health: (\d+)/(\d+) Mana: (\d+)/(\d+) Lessons: (\d+) Bleed: (\d+)$
trigger.name: max_health_and_mana

trigger.match: Hellish flames erupt from unseen holes enveloping you and your surroundings.
trigger.name: hellflames

trigger.match: The skies above you darken as ominous dark clouds gather.
trigger.name: hailstorm

trigger.match: ^(.*) excites your rootsense as he|she is stricken by ritual-magic.$
trigger.send: if string.find("%1", target) then Sound(GetInfo(67).."/sounds/tick5.ogg") Note( "Tick!" ) else Sound(GetInfo(67).."/sounds/tick.ogg") Note "Tick %1." end

trigger.match: reaches into a whirling earth elemental infused by elemental roots, powering (himself|herself) to strike.$
trigger.name: earthbolt_prep_gag

trigger.match: The whirling earth elemental disperses harmlessly, its power spent.
trigger.name: earthbolt_spent_gag

trigger.match: ^A crackling burst of light breaks through your blindness to strike your blackened retina. The flash revitalises your eyes and sight is soon restored.$
trigger.name: flame_rune

trigger.match: ^You see a ([A-Za-z]+)-shaped rune out of the corner of your eye.$
trigger.name: rune_spotted

trigger.match: There is a flash of silver beneath your steed which rears into the air, throwing you heavily to the ground. You lie on the ground stunned and helpless.
trigger.name: snake_rune

trigger.match: (.*?) steps out from beneath (his|her) aura.
* floats gently to the ground.'
* is no longer invisible.
* returns to walking pace.
* tense muscles are relaxed by your hypnotic movements.
^You have relaxed (.*?) into losing the sixth sense\.$
^You strip .* of fire resistance.$
You deprive * of blackheart markings.
You relax * extra-ordinary magical resistance.
You relax * from fear to calm.
trigger.name: calm_scathe

trigger.match: You wave away the shield of deflection which surrounds (.*).
* has been slain by Agarwain*
*god of * tells you*
trigger.name: god_tell

trigger.match: ^(.+) has just left you a message.$
^.*is now swinging (his|her) blade at high speed about (his|her) head, bearing down upon you.$
trigger.name: second_cleave

trigger.match: ^.*spins (his|her) blade about (his|her) head and moves towards you menacingly.$
trigger.name: first_cleave

trigger.match: ^A shadowy silhouette of (.*) appears
^Your augmented fireball would require
trigger.name: fireball_failed

trigger.match: ^Your rune-bug picks up words.*(tells|answers) you
trigger.name: tell_sound

trigger.match: begins to mix up a.*potion.$
trigger.name: mixing_potion_sound

trigger.match: Death is no enemy of yours, for you have subjugated even his minions by your awesome power.
trigger.name: power_slain

trigger.match: has started to follow you.$
trigger.name: someone_started_following

trigger.match: is impervious to your attack due to divine splendour.$
trigger.name: spit_fail_sound

trigger.match: The healing liquid sends a tingle down your spine.
trigger.name: sip_health_sound

trigger.match: You bare your bottom derisively to the world.
trigger.name: moon

trigger.match: You cover up your behind - figuring your mooning has served its purpose.
trigger.name: unmoon

trigger.match: You have regained magical equilibrium.
trigger.name: magical_equilibrium_sound

trigger.match: You pour the potion of mind control down your throat.
trigger.name: health_sound

trigger.match: You spit * at *
trigger.name: spit_sound

trigger.match: Your eyes grow luminous as good-luck courses through your veins.
trigger.name: luck_sound

trigger.match: Your recent olvar consumption re-knits your wounded sinews and fends away the approaching Death...
trigger.name: olvar_sound

trigger.match: lurches at you and stabs you in the back.$
trigger.name: stabbed

trigger.match: ^(.*) calls (to|his|her) (.*)\: (.*)
^(he|she) is stricken by the (.*)$
^You are so weak-wristed that you cannot hold (.*). It falls to the ground.$
trigger.name: drop_wielded

trigger.match: ^Your rune-bug picks up words: (.*)$
Your movements become sluggish - as if in slow-motion - as vibrations from the heavy fife-music envelop you. Your very breathing grows shallow and laboured under the suffocating effects.
trigger.name: given_sloth_sub

trigger.match: You clench your fists and roar arrogantly.
trigger.name: fists_shorthand

trigger.match: You crack your (left|right) hand into place.
trigger.name: fists_cured_arm

trigger.match: You inhale deeply and hold your breath.
trigger.name: holdbreath

trigger.match: Clouds fill your mind as you fall into a deep slumber.
trigger.name: rune_sleeped

trigger.match: You are asleep and incapable of acting; type WAKE to wake yourself up.
trigger.name: asleep_trig

trigger.match: You bend your head forward and chunder.
trigger.name: vomiting3

trigger.match: You cannot even countenance going up. It is a fearful concept.
trigger.name: have_vertigo

trigger.match: You cannot smoke anything; your windpipe is painful and contracted.
trigger.name: windpiped

trigger.match: You cough and wheeze into your pipe, unable to inhale.
trigger.name: have_asthma

trigger.match: You could not face drinking anything. Liquids revolt you.
trigger.name: anorexia_drink

trigger.match: You could not face eating anything. Food revolts you.
trigger.name: anorexia_eat

trigger.match: You despair of your predicament.
trigger.name: have_nann

trigger.match: You fall into a deep slumber.
trigger.name: potion_sleeped

trigger.match: You lurch into action.
trigger.name: sloth_symptom

trigger.match: You spit out the (.*?); why bother healing?
trigger.name: pessimism2

trigger.match: You spit out the potion; what is the point of healing?
trigger.name: pessimism1

trigger.match: You spot a way to go down and flee.
trigger.name: vertigo_symptom

trigger.match: You vomit all over the place.
trigger.name: vomiting1

trigger.match: Your face goes green and you spew all over the place.
trigger.name: vomiting2

trigger.match: A pair of ropes fly in and wrap around your throat; you are pulled * against your will.
trigger.name: yanked

trigger.match: ^(.*) has a health of (\d+) / (\d+).$
trigger.name: touch_enemy
trigger.send: enemyHealth = tonumber("%2") enemyMax = tonumber("%3") Note "%2 / %3" if (enemyHealth / enemyMax * 100) < 25 then Sound(GetInfo(67).."/sounds/crithit.wav") end --if

trigger.match: You twitch your nostrils and pick up the scent leading *.
trigger.name: scent_replacement
